name: Animal Jigsaw Kids Puzzle
description:
Are you looking for something fun, cool, addicting, entertaining and educational game for your Children?

Animal Jigsaw kids puzzles game about cute animals! it is a fun jigsaw puzzle game applicable for all ages.Animal Jigsaw puzzles is an ideal game for all the toddlers and young children who are simply in love with assembling pictures. It is also a perfect solution for the parents, who are tired with constant taking out and clearing after their child playing with puzzles. 

Super Puzzle works almost like real jigsaw puzzles for kids. Once you pick a piece it stays on the board even if you place it incorrectly, and you can nudge pieces around until it snaps to the right slot.

Learn Animals Jigsaw kids Puzzle game for Preschool, Toddler kids.If your preschool kids like jigsaw puzzles, they will LOVE Super Animal Puzzle!

The important thing is let our children know the animals and then love them.

 Features:

⁃ Unique Animal Puzzles 

⁃ Unique rewards for each puzzle 

⁃ Learning while playing jigsaw puzzles

⁃ Sweet background music

⁃ Simple & intuitive child-friendly interface  


How to play Jigsaw Puzzles:

Drag the puzzle pieces to the shadow of that piece!

Download and play Animal Jigsaw puzzles game with all family members!
